amendment.description: Amendment moves $13.8 million from the mixed oxide portion of the nonproliferation account to the nuclear smuggling and detection as well as the research and development accounts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Defense Nuclear Non-Proliferation by $13,802,000 and then increase by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Fortenberry.
